DOC.brief_summary: This study is an open-label, randomized, pilot comparison of the effects of either lopinavir/ritonavir or efavirenz in combination with tenofovir plus emtricitabine on cholesterol metabolism, mitochondrial functioning and immune response in 50 naive HIV patients after 48 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of 2 Initial Standard Antiretroviral Combinations Therapies on Lipid Metabolism
